portfolioItems.filter(item => item.category === 'cuisine').length }, { id: 'rangement', name: 'Rangements', count: portfolioItems.filter(item => item.category === 'rangement').length }, { id: === 'enfants').length } ]; const filteredItems = selectedCategory === 'all' ? portfolioItems : portfolioItems.filter(item => item.category === selectedCategory); const openModal = (itemId: number) => { setSelectedItem(itemId); document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden'; }; const closeModal = () => { setSelectedItem(null); document.body.style.overflow = 'auto'; }; const selectedPortfolioItem = portfolioItems.find(item => item.id === selectedItem); return (
